function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased annoyance ratings for neighbour noise sources","Impact":"Negative impact on mental health and well-being","Mitigation":"Implement noise insulation and soundproofing measures","Technologies":"Acoustic panels, double-glazed windows, noise-cancelling headphones","People":"Residential communities, occupants of buildings","Owner":"Property managers, building owners, local governments"},{"Description":"Changes in outdoor noise levels due to lockdown measures","Impact":"Disruption of people's perception and response to noise","Mitigation":"Public education on the causes and effects of noise pollution","Technologies":"Public awareness campaigns, community noise monitoring technologies","People":"General public, urban residents","Owner":"Local governments, environmental organizations"},{"Description":"Increase in outdoor noise complaints on social media","Impact":"Negative impact on public perception and community well-being","Mitigation":"Implement measures to address specific outdoor noise sources","Technologies":"Noise monitoring sensors, urban planning strategies, community engagement initiatives","People":"Social media users, local residents","Owner":"Local governments, community organizations"}]}
